resources.string:
Hi. This is my bio.


It is an unnecessarily long bio. 

But it is my bio. It is long and pointless and has no relevant information other than to exemplify the functionality of whatever view is using this long text.

PLEASE STOP SCROLLING!

For the love of all that's dear to this Earth, please STOP SCROLLING!!!
